locations.name: Turia Gardens
locations.npc_dialogue: The flowers bloom beautifully here, but they remind me of a lost love.

locations.npc_dialogue: Fishermen often tell tales of the sea, but one spoke of a woman who loved the ocean too much.

locations.name: Notre-Dame de la Garde
locations.npc_dialogue: From up here, you can see everything, even the shadows of those who hide.

locations.name: Palais des Congrès
locations.npc_dialogue: I overheard someone mention a car that roars like a lion, but I can't recall who it was.

locations.name: Piazza De Ferrari
locations.npc_dialogue: The fountain flows like the secrets of the city, but only the wise can drink from it.

locations.name: Genoa Aquarium
locations.npc_dialogue: I saw a woman sketching fish here, her hair flowing like the water.

locations.name: Via Garibaldi
locations.npc_dialogue: They say the best stories are hidden in plain sight, just like the art on these walls.

Can you uncover the truth before the suspect vanishes into the shadows?
